verses.text: Now \w after|strong="H0310"\w* these \w things|strong="H1697"\w*, in the \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* of \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*, \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Seraiah|strong="H8304"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w*,
The \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahitub|strong="H0285"\w*,
The \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amariah|strong="H0568"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Meraioth|strong="H4812"\w*,
The \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zerahiah|strong="H2228"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Uzzi|strong="H5813"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bukki|strong="H1231"\w*,

The \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Abishua|strong="H0050"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*:

This \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*; and he \add was\add* a \w ready|strong="H4106"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w* in the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* had \w given|strong="H5414"\w*: and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w granted|strong="H5414"\w* him all his \w request|strong="H1246"\w*, according to the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w* upon him.

And there went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \add some\add* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, and the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w*, and the \w porters|strong="H7778"\w*, and the \w Nethinims|strong="H5411"\w*, unto \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, in the \w seventh|strong="H7651"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

And he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* in the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, which \add was\add* in the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

For upon the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \add day\add* of the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w began|strong="H3246"\w* he to go \w up|strong="H4609"\w* from \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and on the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \add day\add* of the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* he to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, according to the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of his \w God|strong="H0430"\w* upon him.\f + \fr 7.9 \ft began…: Heb. was the foundation of the going up\f*

For \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* had \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*, and to \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* and \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*.

¶ Now this \add is\add* the \w copy|strong="H6572"\w* of the \w letter|strong="H5406"\w* that the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* unto \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, \add even\add* a \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w* of the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and of his \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* to \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w*, \w king|strong="H4430"\w* of \w kings|strong="H4430"\w*, unto \w Ezra|strong="H5831"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3549"\w*, a \w scribe|strong="H5613"\w* of the \w law|strong="H1882"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0426"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \w perfect|strong="H1585"\w* \add peace\add*, and at such a \w time|strong="H3706"\w*.\f + \fr 7.12 \ft unto…: or, to Ezra the priest, a perfect scribe of the law of the God of heaven, peace, etc\f*

\w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w make|strong="H7761"\w* a \w decree|strong="H2942"\w*, that \w all|strong="H3606"\w* they \w of|strong="H4481"\w* the \w people|strong="H5972"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w*, and \add of\add* his \w priests|strong="H3549"\w* and \w Levites|strong="H3879"\w*, in my \w realm|strong="H4437"\w*, which are minded of their own \w freewill|strong="H5069"\w* to go \w up|strong="H1946"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, \w go|strong="H1946"\w* with \w thee|strong="H5974"\w*.

\w Forasmuch|strong="H1768"\w* \w as|strong="H3606"\w* thou art \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, and of his \w seven|strong="H7655"\w* \w counsellors|strong="H3272"\w*, to \w enquire|strong="H1240"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5922"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3061"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, according to the \w law|strong="H1882"\w* of thy \w God|strong="H0426"\w* which \add is\add* in thine \w hand|strong="H3028"\w*;\f + \fr 7.14 \ft of the king: Chaldee, from before the king\f*

And to \w carry|strong="H2987"\w* the \w silver|strong="H3702"\w* and \w gold|strong="H1722"\w*, which the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* and his \w counsellors|strong="H3272"\w* have freely \w offered|strong="H5069"\w* unto the \w God|strong="H0426"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w*, \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* \w habitation|strong="H4907"\w* \add is\add* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*,

And \w all|strong="H3606"\w* the \w silver|strong="H3702"\w* and \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* that thou canst \w find|strong="H7912"\w* in \w all|strong="H3606"\w* the \w province|strong="H4083"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, \w with|strong="H5974"\w* the freewill \w offering|strong="H5069"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5972"\w*, and of the \w priests|strong="H3549"\w*, offering \w willingly|strong="H5069"\w* for the \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of their \w God|strong="H0426"\w* which \add is\add* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*:

\w That|strong="H3606"\w* thou mayest \w buy|strong="H7066"\w* \w speedily|strong="H0629"\w* with \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w money|strong="H3702"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H8450"\w*, \w rams|strong="H1798"\w*, \w lambs|strong="H0563"\w*, with their meat \w offerings|strong="H4504"\w* and their drink \w offerings|strong="H5261"\w*, and \w offer|strong="H7127"\w* \w them|strong="H1994"\w* \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4056"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of your \w God|strong="H0426"\w* which \add is\add* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*.

And \w whatsoever|strong="H4101"\w* shall seem \w good|strong="H3191"\w* to thee, and \w to|strong="H5922"\w* thy \w brethren|strong="H0252"\w*, to \w do|strong="H5648"\w* with the \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* of the \w silver|strong="H3702"\w* and the \w gold|strong="H1722"\w*, that \w do|strong="H5648"\w* after the \w will|strong="H7470"\w* of your \w God|strong="H0426"\w*.

The \w vessels|strong="H3984"\w* also that are \w given|strong="H3052"\w* thee for the \w service|strong="H6402"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of thy \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, \add those\add* \w deliver|strong="H8000"\w* thou \w before|strong="H6925"\w* the \w God|strong="H0426"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*.

And whatsoever \w more|strong="H7606"\w* shall be \w needful|strong="H2819"\w* for the \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of thy \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, which thou shalt have \w occasion|strong="H5308"\w* to \w bestow|strong="H5415"\w*, \w bestow|strong="H5415"\w* \add it\add* out \w of|strong="H4481"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* \w treasure|strong="H1596"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w*.

And \w I|strong="H4481"\w*, \add even\add* \w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, do \w make|strong="H7761"\w* a \w decree|strong="H2942"\w* to \w all|strong="H3606"\w* the \w treasurers|strong="H1490"\w* which \add are\add* \w beyond|strong="H5675"\w* the \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, that whatsoever \w Ezra|strong="H5831"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3549"\w*, the \w scribe|strong="H5613"\w* of the \w law|strong="H1882"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0426"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, shall \w require|strong="H7593"\w* of you, it be \w done|strong="H5648"\w* \w speedily|strong="H0629"\w*,

\w Unto|strong="H5705"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* \w talents|strong="H3604"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3702"\w*, and to an \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* \w measures|strong="H3734"\w* of \w wheat|strong="H2591"\w*, and to an \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* \w baths|strong="H1325"\w* of \w wine|strong="H2562"\w*, and to an \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* \w baths|strong="H1325"\w* of \w oil|strong="H4887"\w*, and \w salt|strong="H4416"\w* \w without|strong="H3809"\w* \w prescribing|strong="H3792"\w* \add how much\add*.\f + \fr 7.22 \ft measures: Chaldee, cors\f*

\w Whatsoever|strong="H3606"\w* is commanded \w by|strong="H2941"\w* the \w God|strong="H0426"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, let it be \w diligently|strong="H0149"\w* \w done|strong="H5648"\w* for the \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0426"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*: \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w why|strong="H4101"\w* should there \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w wrath|strong="H7109"\w* \w against|strong="H5922"\w* the \w realm|strong="H4437"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1123"\w*?\f + \fr 7.23 \ft Whatsoever…: Chaldee, Whatsoever is of the decree\f*

Also we \w certify|strong="H3046"\w* you, that touching \w any|strong="H3606"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3549"\w* and \w Levites|strong="H3879"\w*, \w singers|strong="H2171"\w*, \w porters|strong="H8652"\w*, \w Nethinims|strong="H5412"\w*, or \w ministers|strong="H6399"\w* of \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, it shall \w not|strong="H3809"\w* be \w lawful|strong="H7990"\w* to \w impose|strong="H7412"\w* \w toll|strong="H4061"\w*, \w tribute|strong="H1093"\w*, or \w custom|strong="H1983"\w*, \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* them.

And \w thou|strong="H0607"\w*, \w Ezra|strong="H5831"\w*, after the \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* of thy \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, that \add is\add* in thine \w hand|strong="H3028"\w*, \w set|strong="H4483"\w* \w magistrates|strong="H8200"\w* and \w judges|strong="H1782"\w*, which may \w judge|strong="H1934"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* the \w people|strong="H5972"\w* that \add are\add* \w beyond|strong="H5675"\w* the \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, \w all|strong="H3606"\w* such as \w know|strong="H3046"\w* the \w laws|strong="H1882"\w* of thy \w God|strong="H0426"\w*; and \w teach|strong="H3046"\w* ye them that \w know|strong="H3046"\w* \add them\add* \w not|strong="H3809"\w*.

And \w whosoever|strong="H3606"\w* will \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w do|strong="H1934"\w* the \w law|strong="H1882"\w* of thy \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, and the \w law|strong="H1882"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, let \w judgment|strong="H1780"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w executed|strong="H5648"\w* \w speedily|strong="H0629"\w* upon \w him|strong="H4481"\w*, \w whether|strong="H2006"\w* \add it be\add* unto \w death|strong="H4193"\w*, \w or|strong="H2006"\w* to \w banishment|strong="H8332"\w*, \w or|strong="H2006"\w* to \w confiscation|strong="H6065"\w* of \w goods|strong="H5232"\w*, or to \w imprisonment|strong="H0613"\w*.\f + \fr 7.26 \ft to banishment: Chaldee, to rooting out\f*

¶ \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, which hath \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add such a thing\add* as this in the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, to \w beautify|strong="H6286"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* which \add is\add* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*:

And hath \w extended|strong="H5186"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* unto me \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and his \w counsellors|strong="H3289"\w*, and before all the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*. And I was \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* as the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add was\add* upon me, and I gathered \w together|strong="H6908"\w* out of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* chief \w men|strong="H7218"\w* to go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* with me.
